summary: Implement Phase 3 WSP Economic Layer (Soft Launch): introduce WSP ICRC-1 tokenization of contribution points with mint/burn logic, UI profile staking fields, governance stubs, balances UI, and admin-only token controls (test mode).
architectural_notes: Phase 3 uses a placeholder ICRC-1 ledger implementation inside the application/canister; real on-chain WSP deployment can be activated later.

existing_features.title: Update the Profile page UI to show basic WSP token balance sourced from the backend ledger, and display it alongside existing contribution points.
Add staking fields to user profiles on the frontend only (no backend persistence required), including inputs and basic client-side validation.
Add admin-only token operations controls (test mode) to the existing Admin area UI, including the ability to mint and burn WSP for a specified principal, backed by admin-gated backend methods.

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert contribution points into an ICRC-1 token (WSP)
Add mint logic for valid contribution events (WSP)
Add burn logic for slashing/invalidated events (WSP)
Add staking fields to user profiles (front-end only)
Add governance stubs for future DAO proposals
Add basic on-chain token balances to profile UI
Add admin-only controls for token operations (test mode)

Implement an embedded ICRC-1-style token ledger for WSP inside the existing backend single actor, including persistent balances, total supply, and the core public query/update methods needed to read balances and perform transfers.
Add minting logic that mints WSP for valid contribution events, ensuring minting is idempotent with existing duplicate-prevention for contribution events.
Add burn logic to support slashing/invalidated contribution events, including a backend pathway to mark events invalidated and burn the corresponding WSP from the contributor when applicable.
Add governance stubs in the backend for future DAO proposals, including types and placeholder methods that compile and can be safely called but clearly indicate "not implemented" behavior.

projectName: Phase 3: Add WSP ICRC-1 token accounting, mint/burn, staking UI fields, governance stubs, balances UI, and admin token controls
